docs.title: 🌴 Your AI friend in paradise
docs.text:
Bali Buddy is your local buddy powered by AI — helping you explore, live, and enjoy Bali with ease.

No extra apps, no learning curve: just chat naturally in the tools you already use — always in your own language 🌐.

docs.title: 🤖 Why Bali Buddy?
docs.text:
• Smarter than general AI tools → knows Bali’s latest visa rules, healthcare, and hidden gems.
  • Simpler than Google Maps & TripAdvisor → no outdated reviews, no clutter.
  • Built for you → personal answers, in your language, inside the apps you already use.
  • Roadmap → launching first on Telegram, expanding soon to WhatsApp.

👉 Save time with up-to-date, trusted guidance for life and travel in Bali.

🏝️ Discover Bali as a Tourist 🌍 Life in Bali as an Expat 💼 Partner as a Business

docs.title: 🏝️ For Tourists
docs.text:
Traveling to Bali? 🌴 Your buddy makes your holiday simple and memorable:

  • Discover beaches, temples, surf spots, and cultural highlights.
  • Find the best restaurants, cafés, yoga retreats, and nightlife.
  • Plan your trip before arrival, get help while you’re here.
  • Always updated — not a book, but a living guide that evolves with Bali.

👉 Enjoy Bali like a local.

🚀 See how to join

docs.title: 🌍 For Expats
docs.text:
Living in Bali is amazing, but reliable info can be hard to find. Bali Buddy helps you:

  • Ask in 20+ languages.
  • Stay up to date on visas, healthcare, and emergency contacts.
  • Explore schools, family spots, and kids’ activities.
  • Connect with co-working hubs and weekend getaways.

👉 Bali life, simplified.

🚀 See how to join

docs.title: 💼 For Businesses
docs.text:
Tourists and expats are always looking for where to eat, relax, and explore. Bali Buddy puts your business in their hands — inside the apps they already use.

Supports all types of businesses: - Local warungs, guides, drivers, and restaurants. - Expat-owned restaurants, cafés, yoga studios, surf schools, and wellness centers. - Reach tourists, families, and nomads naturally. - Grow with a simple monthly subscription — no campaigns or bidding wars, just real connections and clear insights.

👉 Be where people are already searching.

💼 See how to partner

docs.title: 🚀 Join Bali Buddy
docs.text:
Private Development

⚠️ Bali Buddy is in private development. We’re starting with a Telegram pilot, and only a small group of early adopters will be invited.

👉 Join the waitlist to be among the first to try it and help shape Bali Buddy with your feedback.

By signing up, you’ll: - Get exclusive early access when invitations open. - Help shape Bali Buddy’s future with your feedback. - Be part of the first community of tourists, expats, and businesses.

docs.title: 🍪 Cookie Policy for Bali Buddy
docs.text:
Effective date: 03/09/2025

Bali Buddy is a project of Xift OÜ, a company registered in Estonia (EU). This website (https://balibuddy.ai) uses cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience and to collect anonymous usage statistics.

docs.title: 1. What are cookies?
docs.text: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They allow us to remember your preferences and understand how visitors use the site.

docs.title: 2. What types of cookies do we use?
docs.text:
We use only essential cookies and analytics cookies:

  • Essential cookies: Required for the basic operation of the site (e.g., language preference, navigation). These do not collect personal data.

  • Analytics cookies (Google Analytics 4):

  • Provider: Google LLC

  • Purpose: To understand how visitors interact with our site (page views, clicks, device type, country).
  • Data: Collected in an anonymized way (we do not see your exact IP address).
  • Retention: As defined by Google Analytics.

We do not use advertising or profiling cookies.

docs.title: 3. How can you manage cookies?
docs.text:
You can accept or reject analytics cookies by adjusting your browser settings:

  • Block all non-essential cookies.
  • Delete cookies already stored.

If you block cookies, the site will still work, but some statistics will not be collected.

docs.title: 4. Third-party services
docs.text:
Google Analytics is provided by Google LLC (1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA, USA). Data may be transferred outside the EU, but Google is committed to GDPR compliance under the EU–US Data Privacy Framework.

More info: Google Privacy Policy

docs.title: 5. Changes to this policy
docs.text: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. Updates will be published on this page.

docs.title: Privacy Notice
docs.text: Bali Buddy is a project of Xift OÜ, a company registered in Estonia (EU). We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data.

docs.title: What data we collect
docs.text:
When you sign up for the waitlist or partner form, we may collect:

  • Name

  • Email address

  • Language preference

  • Information about your interests (tourist, expat, or business)

  • Business details (for partners)

docs.title: How we use your data
docs.text:
We use this information to:

  • Manage early access to Bali Buddy

  • Personalize communication and updates

  • Understand the needs of tourists, expats, and partners

  • Improve our service and knowledge base

We will never sell or share your data with third parties. Your information is stored securely in Google Forms and Google Sheets.

docs.title: Legal basis
docs.text: We process your personal data with your consent, given when you submit a form on our website.

docs.title: Your rights (under GDPR)
docs.text:
As an EU-based company, we follow the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

You have the right to:

  • Request access to your data.

  • Request correction or deletion.

  • Withdraw your consent at any time.

To exercise these rights, contact us at: info@xift.ai
